sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ks-contact-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \\’Plugins\\’ menu in WordPress
  3. In your Widgets menu, simply drag the widget labeled \\”Ks Contact Widget\\” into a widgetized Area.
  4. Configure the widget by choosing a title, about me, link more, address, phone, twitter, icon size and color, and the URLs to your various social profiles.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire ks-contact-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \\’Plugins\\’ menu in WordPress
  3. In your Widgets menu, simply drag the widget labeled \\”Ks Contact Widget\\” into a widgetized Area.
  4. Configure the widget by choosing a title, about me, link more, address, phone, twitter, icon size and color, and the URLs to your various social profiles.

Can I reorder the icons?

No, not at this time.

Which services are included?

  • About Me
  • Read more
  • Address
  • Phone
  • Fax
  • Twitter
  • Bloglovin
  • Dribbble
  • Email
  • Facebook
  • Flickr
  • Github
  • Google+
  • Instagram
  • LinkedIn
  • Pinterest
  • RSS
  • StumbleUpon
  • Tumblr
  • Twitter
  • Vimeo
  • YouTube
